eng: Penalty awarded in the penalty area.
A penalty kick is now being taken.
Goalkeeper will attempt to save the penalty.
can: 犯规发生在禁区内的点球。
守门员将尝试扑救点球。

eng: Kick-off begins the first half.
Team A starts with the ball.
Restart after a goal or half-time.
can: 进球或半场结束后的重新开始。

eng: Goal scored by Team B!
What a wonderful goal!
The ball is now out of play.
Substitution: Player A comes on for Player B.
Team makes a tactical substitution.
Fresh legs coming on!
can: 换人：玩家A替换玩家B上场。

eng: Offside! Play is stopped.
The assistant referee signals offside.
Positioning was just offside.
can: 位置刚刚越过了越位线。

eng: Shots on target! That was close.
A dangerous shot towards the goal.
Good shot! It's heading towards the top corner.
can: 一次危险的射门朝向球门。
好射门！球正向球网上方飞去。

eng: Shot went just wide.
Close but no goal.
That was off target.
Clearance from the back.
Long ball away from danger.
Good defensive clearance.
Ball out of play! Throw-in for the opposing team.
That was a good save, but the ball is out.
Restart with a goal kick.
can: 球出界了！对方获得掷界球。
这是个好扑救，但球出了底线。
将进行球门球重新开始。

eng: Take the throw-in for Team A.
Quick throw to launch an attack.
The throw-in is coming in.
Foul! Free kick for the defending team.
That was a clear handball.
Penalty kick awarded for a foul in the penalty area.
can: 犯规！攻方获得间接任意球。
判罚点球，因为在禁区内犯规。

eng: Indirect free kick! Play needs to go back.
Team B will take an indirect free kick.
The ball must be passed before scoring.
can: 间接任意球！比赛必须回传。
球必须被传递后才能射门。

eng: Direct free kick! Can score directly into the goal.
Take the direct free kick here.
Long-range direct! This could be a goal.
can: 直接任意球！可以直接射门进球。
在这里执行直接任意球。
远距离直接射门！这可能是个进球。

eng: Corner kick awarded! Team A sends in the ball.
Good position for a corner.
The ball is swung in from the corner.
Yellow card shown to the player.
Red card shown for a serious foul.
Two yellows resulting in a red card.
